tiles.title: Count by HTTP status - local
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID

Filter:
- System user ID
- Agent name: Client who called the API
- Request ID = Client request ID or Client session ID
- Request string

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").WebRequestStatistics,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").WebRequestStatistics
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where OrganizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where SystemUserId contains agentid or isempty(agentid)
| where UserAgent contains agentname or isempty(agentname)
| where * contains reqid or isempty(reqid)
| where Request has requeststring or isempty(requeststring)
| extend StatusCode_Meaning = case(
HttpStatus=='100 Continue', 'The server has received the request headers, and the client should proceed to send the request body',
HttpStatus=='101 Switching Protocols', 'The server has agreed to switch protocols as requested by the client',
HttpStatus=='102 Processing', 'The server is still processing the request',
HttpStatus=='200 OK', 'The request was successful, and the server has returned the requested data',
HttpStatus=='201 Created', 'The request was successful, and a new resource was created as a result',
HttpStatus=='204 No Content', 'The server successfully processed the request but is not returning any content',
HttpStatus=='206 Partial Content', 'The server is delivering only part of the resource due to a range header sent by the client',
HttpStatus=='300 Multiple Choices', 'Indicates multiple options for the resource from which the client may choose',
HttpStatus=='301 Moved Permanently', 'Tells the client that the resource has been permanently moved to another location',
HttpStatus=='302 Found', 'Tells the client that the resource has been temporary moved to another location',
HttpStatus=='304 Not Modified', 'Indicates that the resource has not been modified since the last request',
HttpStatus=='307 Temporary Redirect', 'Tells the client that the resource has been temporary moved to another location, but it does not allow the HTTP method to change',
HttpStatus=='308 Permanent Redirect', 'The request and all future requests should be repeated using another URI',
HttpStatus=='400 Bad Request', 'Indicates that the server cannot or will not process the request due to a client error',
HttpStatus=='401 Unauthorized', 'Requires authentication. The request lacks valid authentication credentials',
HttpStatus=='403 Forbidden', 'The server understood the request, but it refuses to authorize it',
HttpStatus=='404 Not Found', 'The server cannot find the requested resource',
HttpStatus=='405 Method Not Allowed', 'The method specified in the request is not allowed for the resource identified by the request URI',
HttpStatus=='412 Precondition Failed', 'Access to the target resource of this conditional request has been denied. The condition defined by the If-Unmodified-Since or If-None-Match headers is not fulfilled.',
HttpStatus=='429', 'Too many request, the user has sent too many requests in a given amount of time and the request exceed the API limitation',
HttpStatus=='500 Internal Server Error', 'A generic error message indicating that an unexpected condition was encountered by the server',
HttpStatus=='501 Not Implemented', 'The server either does not recognize the request method or lacks the ability to fulfill the request',
HttpStatus=='503 Service Unavailable', 'The server is not ready to handle the request. Common causes are a server that is down for maintenance or is overloaded',
HttpStatus=='504 Gateway Timeout', 'The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server or some other auxiliary server it needed to access in order to complete the request',
HttpStatus=='505 HTTP Version Not Supported', 'The server does not support the HTTP protocol version that was used in the request',
'NA')
| summarize Count=count() by HttpStatus, StatusCode_Meaning
| project HttpStatus, Count, StatusCode_Meaning
| order by Count desc

tiles.title: API health
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID

Filter:
- System user ID
- Agent name: Client who called the API
- Request string

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").WebRequestStatistics,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").WebRequestStatistics
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where OrganizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where Request has requeststring or isempty(requeststring) 
| where SystemUserId contains agentid or isempty(agentid)
| where UserAgent contains agentname or isempty(agentname)
| summarize Avg_Queuing_Time = avg(QueuingTime), Avg_SDK_Time = avg(SdkTotalMs), Avg_SQL_Time = avg(SqlTotalMs), Avg_SQLConnection_Time = avg(SqlConnectionOpenTotalMs), Avg_Execution_Time = avg(ExecutionTime), RequestCount = count() by bin(TIMESTAMP, 15m)
| order by TIMESTAMP desc
| render timechart

let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").ThrottlingUsage,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").ThrottlingUsage
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where throttleType == 'ApiBurst'
| where endpointType == 'OData' // OData, SdkService, SandboxListener 
| summarize 
    Burst_pass = max(attempted),
    Burst_throttled = max(toint(throttled)),
    Burst_threshold = max(threshold)
    by bin(TIMESTAMP, totimespan(interval))

let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").ThrottlingUsage,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").ThrottlingUsage
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where throttleType == 'TimeUsage'
| where endpointType == 'OData' // OData, SdkService, SandboxListener 
| summarize 
    Time_limit = max(passed)/60000.0, 
    Time_throttled = max(toint(throttled)),
    Time_threshold = max(threshold)/60000.0 
    by bin(TIMESTAMP, totimespan(interval))

let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").ThrottlingUsage,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").ThrottlingUsage
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where throttleType == 'Concurrency'
| where endpointType == 'OData' // OData, SdkService, SandboxListener 
| summarize 
    Concurency_limit = max(passed),
    Concurency_throttled = max(toint(throttled)),
    Concurency_threshold = max(threshold)
    by bin(TIMESTAMP, totimespan(interval))

tiles.title: Org's tables
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID

Filter:
- Component name = table name

query.text:
let TableTypeNameMapping = dynamic(
{
    "AuditBase" : "Log",
    "PluginTraceLogBase" : "Log",
    "RibbonClientMetadataBase" : "File",
    "WebResourceBase" : "File",
    "AnnotationBase" : "File",
    "Attachment" : "File",
    "AsyncOperation" : "File",
    "Mailbox" : "File",
    "Solution" : "File",
    "Microsoft.Athena.TrickleFeedService-Analytics" : "File",
    "account-Analytics" : "File",
    "activityparty-Analytics" : "File",
    "annotation-Analytics" : "File",
    "businessunit-Analytics" : "File",
    "connection-Analytics" : "File",
    "connectionrole-Analytics" : "File",
    "contact-Analytics" : "File",
    "email-Analytics" : "File",
    "lead-Analytics" : "File",
    "metric-Analytics" : "File",
    "opportunity-Analytics" : "File",
    "organization-Analytics" : "File"
});
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrgTableSizes,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrgTableSizes
| where OrganizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where TableName contains tablename or isempty(tablename)
| extend cvttablename = tostring(TableName)
| extend Tabletype = case(tostring(TableTypeNameMapping[cvttablename]) == "File", "File",
                        tostring(TableTypeNameMapping[cvttablename]) == "Log", "Log",
                        "Database")
| summarize TableSizeInPages=max(TableSizeInPages), TIMESTAMP=max(TIMESTAMP), NumberOfRows=max(NumberOfRows), IndexSizeInPages=max(IndexSizeInPages), DataSizeInPages=max(DataSizeInPages), FreeSpaceInPages=max(FreeSpaceInPages) by TableName, Tabletype, IsCustomEntity
| project TIMESTAMP, TableName, IsCustomEntity, Tabletype,
          NumberOfRows, 
          TableSizeMb = TableSizeInPages * 8.0 / 1024.0, 
          IndexSizeMb = IndexSizeInPages * 8.0 / 1024.0,  
          DataSizeMb = (DataSizeInPages) * 8.0 / 1024.0,
          FreeSizeMb = FreeSpaceInPages * 8.0 / 1024.0
|order by TableSizeMb desc

let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrgIndexSize,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrgIndexSize
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where OrganizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where TableName == tablename
| order by IndexName, PreciseTimeStamp, IndexSizeKB desc
| project PreciseTimeStamp, TableName, IndexName, IndexSizeMB = IndexSizeKB / 1024

let cllgetorginfo = (

| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where Role == "AsynchronousProcessingService"
| where queueName contains "AsyncOperationQueue"
| summarize Threshold=max((orgMaxThroughput)*5) by TIMESTAMP
| union (
union 
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrgAsyncBacklogDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrgAsyncBacklogDiagnostics
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| summarize Backlog = avg(['count']) by bin(TIMESTAMP, totimespan(interval))
)

['Retrieve org id']

union

query.text:

| where hasExportFailed == true

tiles.title: Component event by Activity ID
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID

Filter:
- Activity ID
- Solution ID
- Component type

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id_2']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").SolutionComponentEvents,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").SolutionComponentEvents,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").SolutionComponentEvents,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").SolutionComponentEvents
| where PreciseTimeStamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where ActivityId == activityid or isempty(activityid)
| where componentType == comptype or isempty(comptype)
| project PreciseTimeStamp, eventType, isSuccess, componentType, message
| order by PreciseTimeStamp desc

tiles.title: Near-realtime
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID

Filter:
- System user ID
- Agent name: Client who called the API
- Request string
- Request ID = Request ID or Client request ID or Client session ID

query.text:
let cllorg = (
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrganizationDetails,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrganizationDetails
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where OrgId == orgid or isempty(orgid)
| extend URL = case(
Geo=='NA', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='LATAM/SAM', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm2.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='CAN', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm3.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='EMEA', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm4.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='APAC', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm5.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='OCE', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm6.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='GER', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm16.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='JPN', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm7.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='IND', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm8.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='UK', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm11.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='GBR', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm11.dynamics.com'),
strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm15.dynamics.com')
)
| where DomainName == domainname or URL startswith domainname or URL startswith substring(domainname, 0, indexof(domainname, ".com") + 4) or isempty(domainname)
| where Geo == geo or isempty(geo)
| where BAPEnvironmentId == envid or isempty(envid)
| project ScaleGroupId
| take 1
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").FeatureControlSettings,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").FeatureControlSettings
| where ScopeId in (cllorg)
| summarize ModifiedOn=max(ModifiedOn) by Name, Enabled, id, CreatedOn, ['FCB Scope']
| project Name, Enabled, id, CreatedOn, ModifiedOn, ['FCB Scope']

tiles.title: Workflow execution details by workflow ID or record ID
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID

Filter:
- Workflow ID
- Object ID = record ID

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").TraceEvents,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").TraceEvents,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").TraceEvents,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").TraceEvents
| where env_time  between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
// | where ActivityId =~ filterId
| where message contains workflid or isempty(workflid)
| where message contains obid or isempty(obid)
| where message contains "WorkflowExpansion"
// | where message contains "WorkflowDefinitionId" and message  contains "Update"
| extend messageJson = parse_json(message)
| extend WorkflowDefinitionId=tostring(messageJson.WorkflowDefinitionId)
| extend ActivationRecordId=tostring(messageJson.ActivationRecordId)
| extend OperationId=tostring(messageJson.OperationId)
| extend RecordId=tostring(messageJson.RecordId)
| extend SdkMessageName=tostring(messageJson.SdkMessageName)
| extend TriggerAttributeValue=tostring(messageJson.TriggerAttributeValue)
| extend Msg=tostring(messageJson.Message)
// | where isnotempty(ActivationRecordId)
// | take 100
| project env_time, correlationId, serviceRequestId, WorkflowDefinitionId, ActivationRecordId, OperationId, RecordId, SdkMessageName,TriggerAttributeValue,  Msg, message, activityName, activityId
| summarize WFExpansionCount=count(), min(env_time), max(env_time), make_set(serviceRequestId), make_set(OperationId), make_set(TriggerAttributeValue), make_set(activityId) by RecordId, WorkflowDefinitionId, ActivationRecordId, SdkMessageName, activityName
| project min_env_time, max_env_time, Execution_count = WFExpansionCount, WorkflowDefinitionId, ActivationRecordId, SdkMessageName, RecordId, activityName, RequestID = set_serviceRequestId, OperationID = set_OperationId, Trigger_attribute = set_TriggerAttributeValue, ActivityID = set_activityId

tiles.title: All processes executions
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID

Filter:
- Workflow ID

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").BusinessProcessFeaturesExecution,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").BusinessProcessFeaturesExecution,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").BusinessProcessFeaturesExecution,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").BusinessProcessFeaturesExecution
| where TIMESTAMP between(_startTime.._endTime)
| where featureInstanceId contains workflid or isempty(workflid)
| where additionalInfo == "Sync"
| where featureName in ("N/A", "Workflow", "ProcessAction")
| where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| summarize arg_max(TIMESTAMP, correlationId,resultType, stackTrace, errorMessage, elapsedTimeMillSec) by featureInstanceId, featureName
| extend Operation = iif(featureName == "N/A", "BusinessRule", featureName)
| project ExecutedTime = TIMESTAMP, WorkFlowId = featureInstanceId, Operation, Result = resultType, CorrelationId = correlationId, Duration_ms = elapsedTimeMillSec, StackTrace = substring(stackTrace, 0, 200), ErrorMessage = substring(errorMessage, 0,200)
| order by ExecutedTime desc

tiles.title: Failure by Workflow ID
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID
- Workflow ID

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
find in (
  cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net:443").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics,
  cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net:443").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics,
  cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net:443").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics,
  cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net:443").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics
) where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
  and PreciseTimeStamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
  project sqlErrorCode, sqlText
| parse source_ with "cluster(\"" Source ".kusto.windows.net\")" *
| summarize count(sqlErrorCode) by sqlErrorCode, Source, sqlText
| order by count_sqlErrorCode desc

let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
find in (
  cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics
) where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime.._endTime) 
and organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
and executionTimeInMilliseconds > 5000
  project TIMESTAMP, executionTimeInMilliseconds
| project TIMESTAMP = bin(TIMESTAMP, totimespan(interval)), bucket = case(executionTimeInMilliseconds > 120000, "120s+", executionTimeInMilliseconds > 60000, "60-120s", executionTimeInMilliseconds > 30000, "30-60s", executionTimeInMilliseconds > 10000, "10-30s", "5-10s")
| evaluate pivot(bucket, count())
| extend ExceptionCount = 0
| union 
(
find in (
  cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics
) where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime.._endTime)
and organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
and sqlErrorCode != "2601"
| summarize ExceptionCount = count() by TIMESTAMP = bin(TIMESTAMP, totimespan(interval))
| project TIMESTAMP, ExceptionCount
)

let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
find in (
  cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net:443").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics,
  cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net:443").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics,
  cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net:443").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics,
  cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net:443").database("CRMAnalytics").DBExceptionDiagnostics
) where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
  and PreciseTimeStamp between (_startTime .. _endTime)
  project sqlErrorCode, sqlText
| parse source_ with "cluster(\"" Source ".kusto.windows.net\")" *
| summarize count(sqlErrorCode) by sqlErrorCode, Source, sqlText
| count

query.text:

let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OperationEvents, 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").TraceEvents, 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").TraceError,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OperationEvents,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").TraceEvents,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").TraceError,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OperationEvents,

tiles.title: Extend operation event by correlation ID (contains fdisland)
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID
- Correlation ID

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
let _correlationId = corrid;
let WebRequestStatisticsData = materialize(
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").WebRequestStatistics,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").WebRequestStatistics
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime.. _endTime)
      and OrganizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
    and (ActivityId =~ _correlationId 
           or ClientActivityId =~ _correlationId
         or ClientRequestId =~ _correlationId
       or ClientSessionId =~ _correlationId 
       or requestId =~ _correlationId
       or serverResponseId =~ _correlationId 
         or WebRequestStatsCorrelationId =~ _correlationId
       or Headers has _correlationId)
| extend source = "Web", sourceTable = "WebRequestStatistics"
| project TIMESTAMP, HttpStatus, OperationName, ActivityId, ClientActivityId, ClientRequestId, ClientSessionId, requestId, serverResponseId, WebRequestStatsCorrelationId, Headers, source, sourceTable
| summarize arg_max(TIMESTAMP,*) by ClientActivityId
| extend ColumnsSearched = dynamic_to_json(bag_pack_columns(ActivityId, ClientActivityId, ClientRequestId, ClientSessionId, requestId, serverResponseId, WebRequestStatsCorrelationId))
| project env_time = TIMESTAMP, correlationId = ClientActivityId, serviceRequestId = serverResponseId, clientSessionId = ClientSessionId, clientRequestId = ClientRequestId, principalObjectId = "", activityName = "", operationType = "", activityVector = "", resultType = HttpStatus, source, sourceTable, ColumnsSearched, DisplayPriority = 5);
let OperationEventsData = materialize (
find in (
    cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OperationEvents,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OperationEvents,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OperationEvents,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OperationEvents
    )
    where (env_time between (_startTime.. _endTime))
    and (organizationId in (cllgetorginfo) or OrganizationId in (cllgetorginfo))
      and (ActivityId =~ _correlationId
       or activityId =~ _correlationId
         or clientRequestId =~ _correlationId
       or clientSessionId =~ _correlationId
       or correlationId =~ _correlationId
       or executionId =~ _correlationId
       or parentExecutionId =~ _correlationId
         or requestId =~ _correlationId
         or serviceRequestId =~ _correlationId
         or customDimensions has _correlationId)
| extend source = iff(source_ contains "async", "Async", "Web"), sourceTable = "OperationEvents"
| extend orderPriority = case(resultType == "Failure", 1, resultType == "SuccessDespiteError", 2, resultType == "Success", 3, 4)
| project env_time, source, sourceTable, resultType, activityId = coalesce(activityId,column_ifexists("ActivityId1",""),""), clientRequestId, clientSessionId, correlationId, executionId, parentExecutionId, requestId, serviceRequestId, orderPriority, principalObjectId, activityName, activityVector, operationType
| order by orderPriority asc, env_time desc
| summarize arg_max(env_time,*) by resultType, source
| summarize arg_min(orderPriority,*) by correlationId
| extend ColumnsSearched = dynamic_to_json(bag_pack_columns(activityId, clientRequestId, clientSessionId, correlationId, executionId, parentExecutionId, requestId, serviceRequestId))

let TraceEventsData = materialize (

       or correlationId =~ _correlationId

| order by orderPriority asc, env_time desc

| summarize arg_min(orderPriority, *) by correlationId
| extend ColumnsSearched = dynamic_to_json(bag_pack_columns(activityId, clientRequestId, clientSessionId, correlationId, serviceRequestId))
| project env_time = env_time, correlationId, serviceRequestId, clientSessionId, clientRequestId, principalObjectId , activityName, operationType = "", activityVector, resultType = traceLevel, source, sourceTable, ColumnsSearched, DisplayPriority = 3);

cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").CommunicationEvents,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").CommunicationEvents
    )
    where (env_time between (_startTime.. _endTime))
    and organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
    and (ActivityId =~ _correlationId
       or activityId =~ _correlationId
       or clientRequestId =~ _correlationId
       or clientSessionId =~ _correlationId
       or correlationId =~ _correlationId

| project env_time, source, sourceTable, resultType, activityId = coalesce(activityId,column_ifexists("ActivityId1",""),""), clientRequestId, clientSessionId, correlationId, serviceRequestId, orderPriority, principalObjectId, activityName, operationType, activityVector
| order by orderPriority asc, env_time desc
| summarize arg_max(env_time, *) by resultType, source
| summarize arg_min(orderPriority,*) by correlationId
| extend ColumnsSearched = dynamic_to_json(bag_pack_columns(activityId, clientRequestId, clientSessionId, correlationId, serviceRequestId))
| project env_time = env_time, correlationId, serviceRequestId, clientSessionId, clientRequestId, principalObjectId , activityName, operationType, activityVector, resultType, source, sourceTable, ColumnsSearched, DisplayPriority = 4);
let SandboxExecutionData = materialize(

    )

       or requestId =~ _correlationId

tiles.title: Slow query caused by SQL app lock - local

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
find in (
  cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics
) where TIMESTAMP between(_startTime.._endTime) and organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
and sqlText startswith "sp_getapplock" and sqlText !has "AuthorizationInitSpAppLock"
| extend entityName = extract("@Resource='(.+?)_[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{12}", 1, sqlText)
| extend executionTimeInSeconds = toint(executionTimeInMilliseconds / 1000)
| summarize TotalCount = count() by entityName
| order by TotalCount desc

query.text:
//Retrieve org Info
let cllorg =(['Retrieve org id']);
let que1 = (
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrganizationDetails,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrganizationDetails
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where OrgId == orgid or isempty(orgid)
| where Geo == geo or isempty(geo)
| where BAPEnvironmentId == envid or isempty(envid)
| extend URL = case(
Geo=='NA', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='LATAM/SAM', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm2.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='CAN', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm3.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='EMEA', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm4.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='APAC', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm5.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='OCE', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm6.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='GER', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm16.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='JPN', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm7.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='IND', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm8.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='UK', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm11.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='GBR', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm11.dynamics.com'),
strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm15.dynamics.com')
)
| where DomainName == domainname or URL startswith domainname or URL startswith substring(domainname, 0, indexof(domainname, ".com") + 4) or isempty(domainname)
| extend Version = strcat(tostring(MajorVersion),'.',tostring(MinorVersion),'.',tostring(BuildNumber),'.',tostring(Revision))
| extend OrgType = case(Type == 0, "Production", Type == 4, "Production", Type == 5, "Sandbox", Type == 6, "Sandbox", Type == 10, "Support instance", Type == 12, "Default", Type == 13, "Developer", Type == 14, "Trial", Type == 15, "Teams", "NA"
)
| extend Status = case(OrgStatus == 1, "Enabled", OrgStatus == 0, "Disabled", OrgStatus == 2, "Pending", OrgStatus == 3, "Failed", "Maintenance")
| extend merge=1
| project IsMultiGeo, IsCDS,UserCount, SqlServerName,DatabaseName , Version, FnoUrl,BackupRetentionInDays, merge
| take 1
);
let que2 =  (
union
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrganizationProperties,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrganizationProperties
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where OrganizationID  in (cllorg) or isempty(orgid)
| extend merge=1
| project AdminOnlyMode,merge
| take 1
);
que1
| join kind=inner que2 on merge
| project Details = strcat(
'**MultiGeo enabled**: ', iff(IsMultiGeo=='true','Yes','No'), 
'\n\n**CDS Org**: ', iff(IsCDS=='true','Yes','No'), 
'\n\n**Admin only mode**: ', case(AdminOnlyMode=='0','Off;    **Background jobs**: On', AdminOnlyMode=='1','On;    **Background jobs**: On', AdminOnlyMode=='2','Off;    **Background jobs**: Off','On;    **Background jobs**: Off'),
'\n\n**User Count**: ', UserCount,
'\n\n**SQL Server Name**: ', SqlServerName,
'\n\n**Database Name**: ', DatabaseName,
'\n\n**Version**: ',Version,
'\n\n**FnO Url**: ', FnoUrl,
'\n\n**Max autobackup duration**: ', BackupRetentionInDays, ' days')

query.text:
TraceEvents
    | where env_time between(_startTime .. _endTime)
    | where correlationId == corrid
    | project env_time, env_cloud_roleInstance, activityVector, activityName, traceLevel, message, customDimensions
    | extend cd = parse_json(customDimensions)
    | order by activityVector asc
    | limit 5000

tiles.title: Top execution count
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID

Filter:
- System user ID
- Agent name: Client who called the API
- Request string

tiles.title: Plugin execution count
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID

Filter:
- Plugin type name

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").SandboxExecutionAll,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").SandboxExecutionAll
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where typeName contains plugintypename or isempty(plugintypename)
| where component == "Sandbox Client" 
| where perceivedPassed != 2
|summarize TotalCount = count(), SuccessCount = countif(perceivedPassed==1),FailureCount = countif(perceivedPassed==0) by bin(TIMESTAMP, totimespan(interval))

tiles.title: Retrieve correlation ID from Activity ID - local
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID
- Activity ID

query.text:
union 
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('WebRequestStatistics', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('TraceError', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('BPOCreateCompleted', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('BPODeleteCompleted', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('BPODisassociateCompleted', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('BPOMultipleDeleteCompleted', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('BPOMultipleRetrieveCompleted', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('BPORetrieveCompleted', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('BPOUpdateCompleted', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('SolutionImport', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('SolutionExport', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('SolutionUninstall', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('PublishCustomization', activityid),
GetCorrelationIdFromActivityIdV1('SandboxExecutionAll', activityid)
| summarize by correlationId

tiles.title: Check total status of SQL tunning query
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID
- Query ID

tiles.title: Check single status of SQL tunning query
tiles.description:
Require:
- Organization ID
- Query ID

query.text:
let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
cluster("https://capdamsprod.kusto.windows.net").database("DamsProd").AutotuneLog
| where CE_OrganizationId in (cllgetorginfo) or FnO_EnvironmentId in (cllgetorginfo)
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime .._endTime )
| where QueryId == sqlqueid
| summarize arg_max(LogDate, Status, BeforeDurationMs, AfterDurationMs, Operation),
            max(MissingIndexCreation),
            max(QueryRecompilation),
            max(QueryHintOptimization),
            max(DatabaseTuningAdvisor) by QueryId, Source
| extend Status = iif(Status == 0, 'In Progress',
                  iif(Status == 1, 'Validating Applied Recommendation',
                  iif(Status == 3, 'Rolling Back Applied Recommendation',
                  iif(Status == 2, 'Finished', 'Unknown'))))
| project TIMESTAMP = LogDate,
          QueryId,
          Source,
          Status,
          TuningEvaluationTechniques = strcat(iif(max_QueryRecompilation == 1, 'QueryRecompilation,', ''),
                                          iif(max_MissingIndexCreation == 1, 'MissingIndexCreation,', ''),
                                          iif(max_QueryHintOptimization == 1, 'QueryHintOptimization,', ''),
                                          iif(max_DatabaseTuningAdvisor == 1, 'DatabaseTuningAdvisor,', '')),
          AppliedRecommendations = Operation,
          BeforeDurationMs,
          AfterDurationMs,
          Improvement = todouble(BeforeDurationMs) / todouble(AfterDurationMs)

union 
cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrganizationDetails,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").OrganizationDetails
| where TIMESTAMP between (_startTime.._endTime)
| where OrgId == orgid or isempty(orgid)
| where Geo == geo or isempty(geo)
| where BAPEnvironmentId == envid or isempty(envid)
| extend CaseID = iff(isempty(ticketid)==true, '2402220030000097', ticketid)
| extend URL = case(
Geo=='NA', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='LATAM/SAM', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm2.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='CAN', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm3.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='EMEA', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm4.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='APAC', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm5.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='OCE', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm6.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='GER', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm16.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='JPN', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm7.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='IND', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm8.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='UK', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm11.dynamics.com'),
Geo=='GBR', strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm11.dynamics.com'),
strcat('https://', DomainName, '.crm15.dynamics.com')
)
| where DomainName == domainname or URL startswith domainname or URL startswith substring(domainname, 0, indexof(domainname, ".com") + 4) or isempty(domainname)
| take 1
| project Details = 
iff(
Geo in ('NA', 'LATAM/SAM', 'CAN', 'APAC', 'JPN', 'IND'), 
strcat(
'**Overview**: ', 'https://unify-pme.services.dynamics.com/CRM/Org/', OrgId, '/Incident/ServiceDesk/', CaseID, '/Home'
'\n\n**Increase API limit**: ', 'https://unify-pme.services.dynamics.com/CRM/Org/', OrgId, '/Incident/ServiceDesk/', CaseID,'/OrgHealth/Throttling'
'\n\n**Capacity details**: ', 'https://unify-pme.services.dynamics.com/CRM/Org/', OrgId, '/Incident/ServiceDesk/', CaseID,'/TLC/CapacityDetailsReport'
), 
strcat(
'**Overview**: ', 'https://unify-eu.services.dynamics.com/CRM/Org/', OrgId, '/Incident/ServiceDesk/', CaseID, '/Home'
'\n\n**Increase API limit**: ', 'https://unify-eu.services.dynamics.com/CRM/Org/', OrgId, '/Incident/ServiceDesk/', CaseID,'/OrgHealth/Throttling'
'\n\n**Capacity details**: ', 'https://unify-eu.services.dynamics.com/CRM/Org/', OrgId, '/Incident/ServiceDesk/', CaseID,'/TLC/CapacityDetailsReport'
)
)

// | project Details = strcat(
// '**Tenant Id**: ', TenantId, 
// '\n\n**Organization Id**: ', OrgId, 
// '\n\n**UniqueName**: ', UniqueName,
// '\n\n**Environment ID**: ', BAPEnvironmentId,
// '\n\n**URL**: ', URL,
// '\n\n**Organization Type**: ',OrgType,
// '\n\n**FriendlyName**: ', FriendlyName,
// '\n\n**Status**: ', Status,
// '\n\n**Security Group ID**: ', SecurityGroupGUID)

let cllgetorginfo = (
['Retrieve org id']
);
find in (
  cluster("https://crmanacus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmanaweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodcus.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics,
cluster("https://crmasyncprodweu.kusto.windows.net").database("CRMAnalytics").DBSlowQueryDiagnostics
) where TIMESTAMP between(_startTime.._endTime) and organizationId in (cllgetorginfo)
and sqlText startswith "sp_getapplock" and sqlText !has "AuthorizationInitSpAppLock"
| extend entityName = extract("@Resource='(.+?)_[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{12}", 1, sqlText)
| extend executionTimeInSeconds = toint(executionTimeInMilliseconds / 1000)
| summarize TotalCount = count() by entityName
| project entityName
